title: Financial Chatbot
description: Developed a financial chatbot by fine-tuning the LLaMA 2 7B model specifically for the financial domain. The model provides tailored financial advice and insights.

title: Legal Chatbot
description: Created a legal chatbot by fine-tuning the DistilBERT model on an Indian Constitutional Law dataset. This chatbot offers legal assistance and information based on Indian constitutional law.

title: NaturalSQL
description: Developed a model based on the Transformers architecture, trained from scratch on the WikiSQL dataset. This model converts natural language queries into SQL queries, enabling users to interact with SQL databases using natural language.

title: Myntra Product Recommendation System
description: Designed and implemented a personalized product recommendation system for Myntra. This system uses advanced recommendation algorithms to provide users with tailored product suggestions.

title: IntellectRAG: Enriched LLM Q&A with Document Insights
description: Developed an advanced Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) system utilizing the Mistral 7B model. This system enhances Q&A capabilities by integrating documents, webpages, and YouTube video transcripts for comprehensive information retrieval.

title: AI-Powered Job Matching System
description: Created an AI-powered job matching system that allows users to upload their CVs and search for specific job titles. Based on the user's profile, the system provides the best job recommendations.

title: DetectGPT: AI-Generated Text Detection
description: Developed a system to distinguish between AI-generated and human-written text using a zero-shot approach based on probability curvature. This system implements the methodology outlined in the 'DetectGPT' research paper.
